programme.title: Kang Odong-Odong Bagi Cintanya Dong
programme.desc: Maya hampir diculik, tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pemain odong-odong yang tampan. Mak saudaranya mencari Maya, namun dia sedang dihibur oleh penolongnya yang dianggap sebagai penculik.

programme.title: Intimate Concert Ep4
programme.desc: Konsert istimewa para bintang buat yang tersayang. Persembahan cinta yang tulus untuk keluarga, sahabat dan peminat yang menyokongnya. Menyingkap perjalanan hidup dan kerjaya sang bintang. Apakah kejutan yang akan disampaikan? Apakah cerita lain yang akan dikongsikan?

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husbands funeral.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.desc: This is a collective team-building activity exclusive to musicians. Seven musicians from different cities gathered together and embarked on a music-oriented social and healing journey. During the trip, they form pairs and perform six dual music showcases, seeking their most compatible musical partners. They express themselves, cheer for friendship, and sing with emotion.

programme.title: Ready To Dance Ep8
programme.desc: The top brand leader has sent their youth dance team to the famous 7th District, the ultimate destination for outstanding dancers, to battle for the last position. The young dancers, led by organizer Zhu Zhengting and special coaches Even Wong and NAME, are continually competing and performing to win a badge for their brand. These dedicated young people are giving it their best. Which team will ultimately become China's strongest youth dancing squad?

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep3
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 5 Ep2
programme.desc: This season is upgraded with a new celebrity selection while the celebrities will reveal their experience and love stories by instantly answering questions. The show aims to interpret young peoples views on marriage and love with the collisions between celebrities and audience, and among different generations.

programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep11
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. Breaking from the traditional mentor-led model, they established true mentor-mentee relationships to co-create unique rap labels, and aim to inspire rapper creativity through competitive performances to find the next rap superstar.

programme.desc: This is a collective team-building activity exclusive to musicians. programme.title: The Charm of Jiangsu You’re Never Known Ep1
programme.desc: Led by Meng Fei, an exploration team is embarking on a journey through the province of Jiangsu in China. Comprised of academic experts, cultural celebrities, and exceptional local youth, their mission is to delve into the fascinating towns, unearthing the rich history and cultural significance that lies within. The initiative aims to attract more tourists to Jiangsu and allow them to experience the "flavorful life."

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep3
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: Fantastic Journey Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Meng Fei and Liu Zhenyun aunched"Fei Zhen Style Travel Agency," inviting their friends Li Yajuan (Saeki) and He Guangzhi to join. programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep6
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: Ding Bao Zhen Ep24
programme.desc: The play tells the story of Ding Baozhen, a famous minister in the late Qing Dynasty, in the second half of his life, including the killing of Ande Hai, the two administrations of the Yellow River, the punishment of corruption, the establishment of the Machinery Bureau, and the reform of the salt administration.

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep17
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: China National Park Special Ep2
programme.desc: The program is based on precious animal videos shot by infrared cameras and remote cameras deployed in tens of thousands of protected areas in China.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep172
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4995
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1963
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3449
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep3027
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep229230
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep34
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep313314
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep642
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep986
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1065

programme.title: Transformation of Tainan (M) Ep12
programme.desc: Tainan, as described by literary master Yeh Shih-tao, is a place for dreaming, working, loving, and living leisurely. Since its upgrade to a special municipality in 2010, Tainan has seen significant changes in its economy, infrastructure, and tourism. The three-part series 'Transforming Tainan' offers a glimpse into this remarkable evolution!

programme.title: Golden Indie Awards 2024 (M) Ep1
programme.desc: The Golden Indie Music Awards is an original music award that celebrates creativity, encouraging diverse and dynamic works from Taiwanese musicians. Established in 2010, it prioritizes Taiwan and originality across various genres, transcending language. Aiming to become Asia's leading indie music award, it recognizes digitally released music and honors genres such as rock, folk, electronic, hip-hop, jazz, R&B, and alternative pop.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep68
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1964
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep173
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4996
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe (Jaycee Chan) is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora (Fiona Sit). After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong (the director, playing herself). Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend (Patrick Tang) and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist (Hayama Hiro) threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-retired weather presenter Kwok Ching has always dream of becoming a news anchor. Being a single parent, he interferes in every aspect of his childrens lives, causing them to move away from him. When Kwok Ching receives a doomsday news and finally has the chance to become a news anchor, it is also time to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard (Nick Cheung) but suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates the death of Yan Zhen in an explosion which seems more than an accident to him. Wei then finds out that Yan Zhen looks a lot like Yin, the girlfriend of Yan Zhens childhood friend Lu, and uncovers a tangled web of deceit leading to surprising revelations when he merges details from the past and the present.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lous brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynastys Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Return of the Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.desc: Mo and the Israelis partner up on a container from Africa, but will their alliance result in fool's gold? Matt attacks the competition for a can full of Chinese goods, but it could blow up in his face. And later, things take a bizarre turn when a bunch of strange items from an odd collector spark an intense bidding war

programme.title: Container Wars S3 3
programme.desc: Four containers, straight from the Big Apple, make their way to Long Beach, CA. A can full of broken dummies generates some serious buzz, while a billionaire's unclaimed goods have everyone seeing dollar signs. Plus, a one-of-a-kind auction that includes the container itself.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 5
programme.desc: The Israelis' go hard after what they think is vintage clothing, but will their fashion expertise pay off? Mo and Ty go postal when the doors swing open to reveal some mysterious machinery, and a custom container could land at least one buyer behindbars.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 7
programme.desc: In the fourth and final season of SUPERMAN & LOIS, Clark is locked in a fight for his life while Lois, her boys, and the world must face an unthinkable possibility: What if Superman never returns?

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover are back as a volatile pair of Los Angeles police detectives with completely opposite law-enforcement styles. This time the cops are unhappy with their assignment to baby-sit an accountant. But the mob wants the accountant dead--and is killing everyone who gets in its way in this blockbuster action comedy.

programme.title: Friends S4 19
programme.desc: Drastic changes occur in Ross' relationship with Emily. Monica and Rachel will do anything to get their old apartment back from the guys.

programme.title: Friends S4 20
programme.desc: Monica wears Emily's wedding dress. Chandler forces Joey to get treatment for his snoring at a sleep clinic. Rachel scares Joshua away by impulsively proposing marriage.

programme.title: Friends S4 21
programme.desc: Rachel and the engaged Ross reminisce separately about when they dated each other.

programme.title: Friends S4 22
programme.desc: After Joey almost loses Ross' wedding ring, Ross asks both Joey and Chandler to serve as his best man. The girls host a baby shower for Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends S4 23
programme.desc: In London for Ross' wedding, Chandler and Joey argue while sightseeing. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 20
programme.desc: Jessie hopes to find some hidden gems in a bin full of old furniture.Papa Bear goes fishing for profit.Brandon and Lori gamble big on a business in a box and a very special item from Sean.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers.A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark!Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour.In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction.Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: A secret oriental clan trains an orphan child as a killer expert in martial arts. When he grows up, he runs away and becomes the target of the organization, which also spies on an agent who looks into political crimes in Berlin. In order to live, they must both hide. And fight.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Captain Richard Phillips attempts to escape from armed Somali pirates who hijacked his ship.

programme.title: The Explosion Show S1 1
programme.desc: Tory and Tommy reveal the explosive secrets behind one of the world's largest fireworks companies.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 18

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 1
programme.desc: As the Shens prepare for Harmony Dumplings grand reopening, they learn that they have become the latest victims of a crime wave that has hit their Chinatown community.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 2

programme.desc: The Shens receive a mysterious threat on the eve of Harmony Dumplings reopening. Elsewhere, Jin faces a new challenge and Ryan tries to find Sebastian the perfect gift.

programme.desc: The guys talk ticks, tricks, and antics! What's with Murr's fool proof plans? And Joe's crazy faces? And why is Sal always falling down?! Plus, see the Jokers' best bloopers, and learn all about the guys' annoying habits that aren't captured on camera!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: In this competitive episode Sal, Joe, Q, and Murr battle head-to-head in fierce Joker vs. Joker challenges! Then, Joe and Q, break-it-down old-school-style at the mall. And finally, Sal and Murr face-off in a challenge that literally proves neither is book smart.

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium

programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: A newly-single yuppie's new roommate acquires more than just a room. Stylish, adrenaline-laced thriller stars Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive
programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: A couple stuck at a secluded motel see that several video cameras are attached to their room. They realise that unless they flee, they will become the next victims of a snuff film.

programme.title: Shanghai

programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Attack Force
programme.desc: When aliens arrive on Earth to harvest human DNA, a special agent is assigned to destroy them without letting the public know they exist.

programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - The Kokoda Trail - The Kokoda Trail is a single file footpath that runs in a straight line through Papua New Guinea. As hot days give way to intensely cold nights, it becomes clear why so many have died from the extreme natural elements.

programme.desc: For the first time in his career, Conductor Jason Lai is putting up a concert with a group of amateurs who live with an incurable condition.

programme.desc: The Christmas concert is just two months away but some of Jason's choir members are still struggling to keep up. One of them is Steven, 67, whose form of dementia affects his behaviour and ability to stay focused.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Guam - Martin travels to Guam to see the effect of invasive species on remote islands; discovering animals and humans driven to the edge of extinction. In Palau he meets the endangered Hawksbill Turtle and rare Dugong, learning more about this tiny island's work in world-leading marine conservation.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep1
programme.desc: Blood on the Ground - Alaskans brave the dangers of the Arctic to prepare for Dark Winters return.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet the bat and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Annas clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Annas scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Extreme Ep6
programme.desc: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Extreme Ep6
programme.desc: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chico the Baby Capuchin Ep4
programme.desc: In Brazils Serra da Capivara, Chico, the baby capuchin monkey is learning to integrate into a troop with complicated rules, and exploring a forest full of excitement and danger. But mastering the art of tool use holds the key to his survival.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks Ep3
programme.desc: The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Roatan Ep4
programme.desc: This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But its not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. Its actually a divers paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - The Missing Manzi Ep3
programme.desc: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Elephant Rescue Ep1
programme.desc: When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Camp Phoenix Herd Ep2
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix in Zambias Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills theyll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Predators Uncovered Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the work of two scientists as they study Luangwa Valleys largest carnivores, from lions to wild dogs. Learn what these animals can tell them all about the fragile health of an ecosystem at risk from an ever-expanding human population.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Return of Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Before the Angolan Civil War, lions reigned. But populations dwindled due to war, trophy hunting, and prey depletion. Now, hyenas rule. Follow a band of conservationists hoping to restore Liuwa lions to their former glory.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 - Mob Rules Ep1
programme.desc: The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - A Penguin Proposal Ep1
programme.desc: Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish Ep3
programme.desc: Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Snows of Kilimanjaro Ep4
programme.desc: Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - The Social Network Ep4
programme.desc: Ponder shark community hierarchies as the northern team studies how young blacktips learn social and survival skills. Then rush to Rainbow Beach with the southern team, who are eager to witness the sand tiger sharks most elusive behaviour: mating.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - The Social Network Ep4
programme.desc: Ponder shark community hierarchies as the northern team studies how young blacktips learn social and survival skills. Then rush to Rainbow Beach with the southern team, who are eager to witness the sand tiger sharks most elusive behaviour: mating.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear Ep1
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - The Predator's Plight Ep1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 - Lethal By Design Ep2
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While its true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - The Hungry Leopard Ep1
programme.desc: A revolutionary thermal camera reveals the secret world of nocturnal predators. Follow along as one of the oldest-known leopards struggles to survive her fearsome neighbors: a pride of scavenging lions.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - A Leopard's Last Stand Ep2
programme.desc: A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers Ep1
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Food Stories S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Argyll - In Argyll, Rick meets a Michelin Green Star-winning chef who cooks local and foraged ingredients. He catches langoustine with a teacher-turned-fisherwoman and makes tattie scones.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Melaka - In Melaka on Malaysia's South West Coast, Donal braves the Durian Puff! This snack is filled with the world's smelliest fruit which is hugely popular because once you bite into it, the sweet, creamy inside is very moreish.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Rick joins a team diving for razor clams, makes a dish of grilled shangurro clams, visits Newlyn's ordnance datum and is shown beautiful copperwork at the Penlee Museum.
